Title: The world never gets boring, you could write about anything. It i...
Description: The world never gets boring, you could write about anything. It is a pity nonetheless that much news is about natural disasters and, in particular, wildfires, as we Greeks have gotten used to hearing about their devastating impacts. Today's article is focusing on the ongoing wildfires in Athens, the country's fire tradition, and the recommended safety standards (and how Greece is doing the exact opposite).PoliticsGROn the massive wildfires in AthensCoverage of the events, Greece's tradition with fires, and the regarded safety standards

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Current situation in Kursk oblast, Russia:ğŸ”¸ Ukrainian forces captured Kazachya Loknya, Kubatkin, Pravda, and Yuzhnyi and advanced in Cherkasskoe Porechnoe and Kositsa.ğŸ”¸ Russian forces recaptured Snagost, repelled several attacks on the Korenevo direction, and strengthened positions in the western areas of the battleground.ğŸ”¸ Fighting continues in the areas of Makhnovka, Martynovka, Plekhovo, and Sudzha. Any Ukrainian videos which show Sudzha under control are apparently false.ğŸ—º @PoliticsGR

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡· Detailed analysis of the wildfires in Athens: ğŸ”¸ The fire...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡· Detailed analysis of the wildfires in Athens:ğŸ”¸ The fire began in the Varnavas area and quickly spread in Marathon and Penteli.ğŸ”¸ There are three main fronts; after the lake of Marathon towards Afidnes, from Marathon to Grammatiko, and from a peak of Penteli in the direction of Military Hospital 414. ğŸ”¸ More towns and villages are evacuated, including in the suburbs of Chalandri and Vrilissia. According to latest information, the hill of the National Observatory is also affected.ğŸ”¸ About 700 firefighters and 33 aircrafts are operating.ğŸ”¸ Weathermen forecast that winds will calm down after 7 PM.ğŸ”¸ Countries which are sending help after a Greek government request: Czech Republic (75 firefighters and 25 vehicles), France (1 Super Puma helicopter), and Italy (2 Canadair aircrafts).ğŸ—º @PoliticsGR
